dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class SWTLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement, ISWTWidget

    public class SWTLabel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISWTWidget, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement
    This standard widget represents a label. A label can be created with the following code snippet: 
     WidgetFactory factory = getWidgetFactory();
 factory.createLabel(parent, "LabelWidgetId", "LabelMementoId", "Label");

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b
